content.text:
# Radio Disney Music Award for Best Breakup Song

The following is a list of Radio Disney Music Award winners and nominees for Best Breakup Song.Taylor Swift is the only artist to win this award twice.
Winners and nominees
2010s
{|class="wikitable" width=90%
!Year
!Winner
!Nominees
!Ref.
|-
|align="center"|2013
|"We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together" – Taylor Swift
|
*"Want U Back" – Cher Lloyd
*"Payphone" – Maroon 5 featuring Wiz Khalifa
*"Wide Awake" – Katy Perry
|align="center"|
|-
|align="center"|2014
|colspan="2"
|align="center"|[http://blogs.disney.com/disney-playlist/2014/02/22/just-announced-the-2014-rdma-categories-and-nominees/ Just Announced: The 2014 RDMA Categories and Nominees | Disney Playlist]
|-
|align="center"|2015
|"The Heart Wants What It Wants" - Selena Gomez
|
*"Really Don't Care" - Demi Lovato feat. Cher Lloyd
*"Heartbreak Heard Around the World" - Jacob Latimore feat. T-Pain
|align="center"|
|-
|align="center"|2016
|"Bad Blood" - Taylor Swift
|
*"Hello - Adele
*"Sorry" - Justin Bieber
*"Stitches" - Shawn Mendes
|align="center"|
|-
|align="center"|2017
|"Shout Out to My Ex" - Little Mix
|
*"Sorry - Justin Bieber
*"We Don't Talk Anymore" - Charlie Puth ft. Selena Gomez
*"i hate u, i love u" - gnash ft. Olivia O'Brien
*"Make Me (Cry)" - Noah Cyrus ft. Labrinth
